website_summaries.verdict: If you don't mind the absence of shelves and simply need loads of hanging space, this roomy portable closet is a great choice.
pros: Large and sturdy enough to hold a considerable amount of clothing
Breathable cover protects clothes from dust and insects
Transparent plastic window makes it easy to find what you're looking for without having to open the cover first
Owners comment on how sturdy it is even when filled to capacity
cons: While it's easy enough to put together, the assembly instructions leave a lot to be desired

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems fine to me
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems fine to me, been using it for half a year. Does rock back and forth a bit when moving stuff around but never felt like it was ever going to break. I've slid the whole closet a few times fully loaded to un/plug stuff behind it. Holds enough stuff for me, and I have a few things in the bottom like a real closet as well!
customer_reviews.author: Onyx

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart....
customer_reviews.text: Had it a good month and it broke. I stored clothes in it that I dont touch. One night i heard a bang. Walked all around the house and saw nothing. Went in the room where my clothes were and found that the closet broke. It wasn't packed or full and it was put together according to the directions. Not sure what happened. I bought two, the other one is still standing firmly, but I'm scared that it will happen to that one too. I spent too much money for it to fall apart like that.
customer_reviews.author: Edricia Leonard

customer_reviews.title: This would not assemble properly
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely handy and I have never left a bad review on Amazon but this product took me over 3.5 hours to put together with help and we could not get the last hanging rod in place ( it would not fit) so I can only use 1/2 of this for handing clothes. It was by far the most frustrating experience to put together on anything I have ever worked on doing. I would return it but my real closet collapsed so I need to protect my clothes at this point I have them hanging on the left and just piled on the right since I can not make the last rod fit in place.
customer_reviews.author: cwick

customer_reviews.title: this is not as strong as they say it is ...
customer_reviews.text: this is not as strong as they say it is i put it together and put my clothes in it and about two days later it fell over in the middle of the night and on one bar it broke completely, now i have to lean it against the wall in order for it to stand not strong at all, i hope the other one don't break.
customer_reviews.author: tampa shoe lady

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight closet
customer_reviews.text: I want completely satisfied with my purchase. It isn't as sturdy as it appears and can only hold lightweight clothes such as shirts or sweaters successfully. Not meant for jeans or jackets. It broke in half within weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Bottom
customer_reviews.text: The ad said it protected against bugs, but there is no bottom enclosure, and bug can get in easy. I bought to protect wool suits and some seasonal clothing. I purchased 2, and I am thinking of sending the unopened one back. It is a lot stronger than others, and a hammer is needed to pound the rods into the holes. If it had a sealed bottom, I would have given a "5" star review. The lack of a bottom is found in a customer question. I should have seen that before I purchased 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: "DON'T THROW THE BOX AWAY, YET"....
customer_reviews.text: Less than two days from receiving & assembling this product, I filled it with clothing, as intended. It immediately began to lean forward and eventually fell over. The "foot" broke and the product was no longer useable. It was on level ground (inside my home). It did not support the weight of my clothing properly. I'm disappointed with my purchase & hopefully will be able to get a refund/credit.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Everett Long

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I applaud this company. The first cover ripped while installing it. The company asked me to send a photo of it and I did. They immediately sent a replacement and I did not have the hassle of returning the ripped one. This is the way to do business. The frame by the way is very easy to assemble and is sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Maggie T.

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: This is impossible to put together. Pieces are inconsistently cut and do not fit properly. My return window just passed and I am extremely angry I cannot return this item. I am a loyal Amazon customer who spends a significant amount of money with Amazon. Any help here? Amazon did take back the item. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of clothes, approx 100 items or more
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't put a lot of heavy t hkngs like heavy costs, but definitely fill it tight with shirts, sweaters, or suits. For heavy woolen winter coats, i'd get a Z rack. This is real fine for everything else. Easy to assemble. Mostly keeps out insects. Might be necessary to duct tape the small slits where the poles go through the canvas if you're super concerned, but that is easy and can be hidden well. I would recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Czech Injun

customer_reviews.title: That this item is not useful at all
customer_reviews.text: I order this item thinking it would be sturdy and last, it does not. The item always leans to the side and will never stand up straight, even when I do not have items hanging up. The polls are not strong at all. This is more of hanging up 5 coats if family members come over. Review the photos see how many items are hanging up and take note that the number of items hanging is close to the number of items you can hang up on this wardrobe without it falling apart. Do not buy this item keep looking it is only a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Justyn King

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item although it was a bit more expensive than some of the others due to the high rankings from other customers and its claim of durability. It lasted me just a few months and the bar from which you hang the clothing broke. It cracked and all my clothes ended up in a pile. I have another similar wardrobe by another company that was less expensive that I've had for 2 years. It is still standing and intact. Very disappointing purchase from Whitmore.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this portable closet for my storage unit. Thought it would be great because of the covering, and even encouraged my girlfriend to buy one as well for her clothes. The instructions seemed pretty straight forward until it came to the part where you put the cover on. It says to gently pull it from the feet/base of the closet, over the top bars. It was impossible to do that, and all of a sudden ripped in FOUR places! See images attached. This totally defeats the purpose of keeping the clothes protected from the elements in storage. I plan to return this and request a FULL refund. STEER CLEAR OF THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: K. Will

customer_reviews.title: Description of articles being trustworthy
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with these at all. Both of them have tears in them and they are not even as heavy duty as advertised. I should send them back and I would send them back but my husband does not want to have to take them apart. I apologise, I don't usually have negative things to say bit these are NOT the quality I was expecting. I even purchased the more expensive ones because they're supposed to be heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: E Diane Royce

customer_reviews.title: but basically wasted my money on this
customer_reviews.text: After having about ten dresses hung up, the metal rods started to bend and actually split down the middle, making it unusable. Not sure if I just had a defective model or not, but basically wasted my money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.  You will just end up frustrated and crying.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst waste of money that I have ever bought. The good reviews have to be paid reviews. I have now spent about 2 hours trying to put it together. None of the polls snap in correctly. They keep falling out. The fabric bag is too small and rips every time I put stress on it. I'm frustrated to the point of tears trying to put it together. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Chasity

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!!️
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Take your time putting together and follow instructions. Two people are better but I was able to pull over the cover solo, SLOWLY. Push poles in more securely at the end. You’ll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget W.

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing I ever purchased online
customer_reviews.text: First, the rods to put this together are confusing as there are two separate rods for each side with different letters. Second, the don't fit unless you jam them in which made it super difficult to put it together and took up tons of space. Then, they don't even fit together, I still have one rod that's not fully secure into it's spot. The bonus is the cover actually ripped as I was putting it on. So, not it's unsturdy and damaged. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: I put this unit together by myself in about 30 minutes. The unit is sturdy and spacious. I would have preferred a solid front instead of the plastic window. The bottom does not unzip. I placed baskets on the bottom fabric. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H.

customer_reviews.title: This product was horrible. It was impossible to put together
customer_reviews.text: This product was horrible. It was impossible to put together, and broke before we finished with it. I used a metal rack that I already had and put the outside cover over that. It is not ideal, but it is the best we could do. Do not buy this product. It is bad.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Owens

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions and unzip the cover!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with how easy this is to assemble. It has far exceeded my expectations. The closet is very roomy and holds a lot easily. My long dresses and coats hang without touching the bottom. I am very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Zipper sucks but
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is exactly what we needed. The only downside to this product is when we assembled it, the zipper was stuck and did not want to go up. Once we finally got it up, after about 5 days the zipper broke. Keep in mind this closet is only accessed when we go out. So primarily on weekends and maybe for a dinner on a week night. Now I’m having to keep it open (absolutely hate it). I really would prefer a new one that is able to zip open and close easily. I believe it’s a good product just this one maybe had a defect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: In the past 9 months we downsized from a very large home into a small ranch with no storage. I've bought 3 of these wardrobes since the house doesn't have many closets. It serves the purpose for storage of seasonal or outerwear well.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality-- Better off with a metal one.
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to assemble and lightweight (In this case, 5 stars for light weight isn't a good thing). However, it is just not as durable as another metal wardrobe that I bought for a cheaper price. Overall, was disappointed and the product is already leaning over onto the sturdy metal wardrobe that I have.
customer_reviews.author: BLP

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I don’t have a closet in my living space. This thing is great. It was simple to assemble and it does what it is supposed to do. It hides my clothes baskets as well allows my small assortment of shirts to hang neatly. Just be aware your cats might take it over!
customer_reviews.author: Na

customer_reviews.title: Good concept but missing pieces and confusing assembly
customer_reviews.text: This is a two person job to assemble. It also came with broken wrong pieces and wasted alot of time to put together. Sent back today but it was a nice size if it had worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Corner tore when assembling
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The top corner tore when assembling, but it's still usable. This incident might be isolated to me, but either I received a generic instruction manual, or the wrong one, as it included steps that would be impossible to accomplish.(One step tells you to unzip the cloth into two pieces when in fact the cloth cannot be unzipped as such)
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: holds up!
customer_reviews.text: after reading so many reviews... I was hesitante but gave a try! it works! I have a LOT of clothes and was scared to find it on the floor but it's holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Farfalla

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I filled the bar with clothing went to slide hangers to look at an item, before I even had a chance to put the cover on it. The whole unit shifted snapped and broke. I literally through it away immediately and took a lose in my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Mello

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase. I bought two of these and waited months to assemble because of space issues. Finally put one together 4 weeks ago. Came home and it was laying down on the floor with my clothes with it. I knew as my husband put it together that it seemed flimsy and he said it was horribly manufactured but when it went up I thought how bad can it be. It’s not like I go into it every day. Well it fell apart and now I have another still in the box. Do not bother with this rack.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gregorich

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy!
customer_reviews.text: I am a petite 5’2” woman. I put this together by myself! It was easy as pie to read instructions and assemble! Idk what everyone is complaining about ripping and such. I didn’t have a problem at all! I was skeptical to purchase since everyone had given such mixed reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Alayna

customer_reviews.title: great clothing storage
customer_reviews.text: this was SO easy to assemble and looks great. It will be perfect for extra clothing storage for me now that I'm moving to a place with less closet space
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: durable and trendy!
customer_reviews.text: So I recently moved into a 2 bedroom apartment with 2 closets....the place I had before had 2 full closets plus a spacious walkin closet. I have a more clothes than I thought and would not fit all into my 2 closets I have now so I had to think about a storage closet. I shopped around on Amazon and reviewed this company and decided to purchase one of their products. It was easy to put together and works perfectly for my wardrobe! I would definitely buy another one in the future if needed it!! I recommend it 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Joann Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: This product is what it is....the only thing that was hard for me was once you take the iron pieces out of the bag, you better know which ALPHABET on the bag it came from. I almost screwed this up a couple of times, but over all I'm pleased with the product....husband is a happy camper...and I put it together by myself I'm just 4'11"
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his. I bought it for his college apartment. You know boys, never considered a closet in a bedroom. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The directions are laid out perfectly and everything is labeled. If you follow the instructions you can have this together in about 10 minutes. We are using this as extra coat storage in the garage. Its holding up to all of our heavy winter coats just fine. Its a good value and worth the money if you just need some extra closet storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mehhh
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to pop up, but I don’t this it’s structurally sturdy enough to handle A lot of stuff. Also, easy for bugs to get in.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel M. Khamis

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I an extremely satisfied with this wardrobe. It is spacious, it completely protects my clothes from dust and it looks nice. Also, because it is completely enclosed there is a lot of storage on the bottom of the wardrobe. My only problem was with assembly. I read the instructions wrong and tried to put the covering on beneath the base of the wardrobe. I ended up with a slight tears by the plastic “windows” of the wardrobe. Once I corrected my mistake it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: This fits quite a bit of clothes and you still have room to store stuff at the bottom too purses shoes etc which is great what could make this item better if there was small sturdy piece at the top on the outside of the cover to allow you to put your shoes as well- you can still put your shoes up there on top the liner separates the shoes but they sit directly on top of the hangers . I would by this item again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pace

customer_reviews.title: Should be ordered put together.
customer_reviews.text: It was so easy than at first than it seem like parts where meeting each other so I still got it to gather, I'm giving it away .
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha Rohman

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased and would recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the width and I am so pleased I had room for 3/4 of my fall wardrobe as I dont have closet or storage space...
customer_reviews.author: Debra Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!! Terrible purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom who just moved in with me and we have very little closet space and it's the worest purchase I've made!! It's horrible!! Couldn't get together couldn't get the cover on and it kept falling apart and I paid $50
customer_reviews.author: tracy davis

customer_reviews.title: Portable Wardrobe closet
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this closet! I store all of our dress clothes in these to keep them from getting dusty. I also store off season clothes in them. Also great if you don't have a lot of closet space. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GREAT PRODUCT!  Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY GREAT PRODUCT! Good Quality! Whoo Hoo! I'm COMPLETELY SATISFIED and would give it more than 5 STARS if I could! LOL! I would DEFINITELY recommend this to any one of my family members and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap Rack
customer_reviews.text: This rack is crap. It looks much nicer in the picture. Tried to get a refund with no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Ssshobe

customer_reviews.title: A COMPLETE MESS
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and ignored them, this garment bag is a complete waste of money. DO NOT ORDER IT, My son is a WHIZ at putting things together. This garment bag will make you hate your Mother, It is a piece of pure JUNK!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEIGH COLES

customer_reviews.title: Storing season clothes easier
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to put together, but it is a good size and holds a lot. Well worth it for storing my winter clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Tashia

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together by one person. Appears like it will work just fine for us. I didn't rate durability because I just put it together. But I did not see anything that would be a cause for concern. I am satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: hussar4570

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: This product came with no instruction. This product was the worst to assessable. I had to look it up on YouTube .. you will need at least two people to help.
customer_reviews.author: William Bynum

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was worried after reading some negative reviews but this was so easy to put together. It holds weight well. I have all of our coats and all of my dresses in it right now. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth 102012

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition
customer_reviews.text: Needed a storage area in the attic for extra coats and this is perfect. Super easy to assemble. I’m just nervous to see how the material holds up in the changing temperatures. I’ve had bags of similar material disintegrate on me. But so far so good! Be sure to follow the weight restrictions.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Lopez

customer_reviews.title: nice closets
customer_reviews.text: ran out of closet space so bought 2 of the larger closets for non seasonal clothing - they made it to the house in a couple of days - easy to set up (took my son 15 mins to set up) - look good and seem to be very sturdy. would have given 5 stars but just got them so not sure yet
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Larsen

customer_reviews.title: this is great
customer_reviews.text: I store my large Santa Clauses in these wardrobes. they are very sturdy, easy to put together. Love the material they are made out of. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I love this clothing organizer! It was very easy to assemble providing you follow each step of the directions. I am an older women and I assembled this myself. The only tool needed was a rubber hammer to secure the frame and rods. It is spacious, sturdy, and looks awesome in my room. I highly recommend this clothing organizer.
customer_reviews.author: golflady

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are poorly written. Getting the cloth covering on was a nightmare! Was so annoyed I ended up throwing it away and $50 down the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Broke after assembly and clothes hung...dissatisfied and disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in September for a Christmas gift for my college student, assembly went fine however, the t-bar completely snapped and now the whole storage closet is useless!!! It is beyond repair and would greatly appreciate a refund!
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this wardrobe closet. It keeps all his fancy and business attire free from dust and bacteria. It was easy to assemble and looks classy.
customer_reviews.author: Randy O.

customer_reviews.title: get it
customer_reviews.text: I think it reads the weight limit is 50 lbs but its currently holding a lot more than that. I also put a board on top to use as a shelf. works great
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Product was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy when hanging cloths. Will keep the cloths dust fee and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Malone

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It is a little tight when fitting the pieces together but it is a sturdy final product. I don't know how the outside will hold up to the heat in storage but I'm hopeful
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Portable Closet!
customer_reviews.text: This portable closet is perfect and exactly what we were looking for. Our bedroom closet isn’t very big and we were looking for something with a cover that we can store in the garage. It was very easy to set up, surprisingly sturdy and can hold a lot of jackets. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ilian Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m good at putting things together, it fell apart within six weeks and was a waste of time and money. It only had shirts and spring jackets on it.
customer_reviews.author: H J Hardman

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else. Every piece broke
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst design products I have ever bought. In the process of trying to put it together, every single piece broke. If you’re expecting something that can be sturdy and hold up clothing, I would look elsewhere. A combination of tent poles and cheap plastic isn’t going to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great option for transporting clothing.
customer_reviews.text: This worked out great! I was moving and needed a way to transport clothes in my closet without buying too many hanging moving boxes. This held my coats and other clothes in the moving truck with no problems. Now it is extra storage space for things not in season.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Roomy
customer_reviews.text: This portable closet was easy to assemble by myself. I use it to store quite a few seasonal coats and jackets. I placed totes in the bottom containing scarves, hats, etc. and so far so good. I am very pleased with its durability and roominess.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Grecenuk

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made zipper cover ripped during assembly
customer_reviews.text: Framing is reasonably sturdy I think but the fabric covering was poorly constructed and actually ripped during assembly. So...I can’t use this without the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Renee R. Black

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This portable wardrobe storage is great for hanging extra clothes. It really looks nice if you have to leave it out in view of family and friends. We actually purchased two small ones and one large ones. We did have a need to contact customer service via email and they were very responsive and accommodating. Would definitely purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Speeder

customer_reviews.title: Not strong at all
customer_reviews.text: It broke after a month of me using it very disappointed. Its probably more suitable for kids clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I love this! Completely off ground and no openings.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: question on durability
customer_reviews.text: The product went together well. But I have no way of knowing how durable it is. Clothes are heavy and the rods slide together for short overlaps. If the rods bend much at all under the clothes' weight, the thing will come apart. So I can't tell until I've had it for some time. Looks o.k. off the top.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P. Montague

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together. Was larger than it looks. Held a lot more clothes than I had envision. The only criticism I have is I wish it came in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B.

customer_reviews.title: I need a refund
customer_reviews.text: I need a refund. The rod from the broke. How do I go about getting a refund. This one just felled
customer_reviews.author: Denese Pugh

customer_reviews.title: You have plenty of space
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my Whitmore and I really like the fact that it can hold a lot of my clothing including my coats .it's deep on the for more storage and it's also wide it' a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and high quality
customer_reviews.text: They say it takes 2 people to put together I did it myself I use this in my RV in living room for my clothes love it
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it so far. Haven't "loaded" it up yet to see how it handles a lot of weight, but seems very sturdy, easy enough to assemble for one person and for what it is, quite attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Christina P.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This closet was a great purchase for storing clothing. The description says it can hood up to 50 lbs but I think it can hold more. It was worth the price and I highly recommend it.Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart within weeks of buying
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this product. It was difficult to assemble (even with two people working on it), and the bar snapped after a couple weeks of use. It’s currently stuck together with some duct tape and a wooden splint, but it has to be readjusted every so often. Wish I’d looked elsewhere for a similar product.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Not  the product advertised. OK is all I can say.
customer_reviews.text: Cover tore very easy. Could have gotten it for less at Walmart. Not as sturdy as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Stepney

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love my storage units. They hold a lot, are very sturdy, and were easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna Frankenfeld

customer_reviews.title: True to it's word
customer_reviews.text: The Whitmor Portable Wardrobe Clothes Storage Organizer Closet was easy to assemble, but you need two people. I brought one for my winter clothes. It was sturdy and held up to the heaviness of the clothes. I ended up buying another one for clothes I don't wear. It's holding up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Terry

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great but dont put too much in it.. One of the zippers broke pretty early but other than that its fine. We use it in the basement to store jackets and other seasonal items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD THING WE HAVE A MECHANICAL SON WHO PUT IT ...
customer_reviews.text: THE PACKAGE CAME OPENEDAND DIRECTIONS MISSING. GOOD THING WE HAVE A MECHANICAL SON WHO PUT IT TOGETHER. HAVETO BE CAREFUL NOT TO OVERLOAD IT.
customer_reviews.author: PJmax

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wardrobe for my winter coats since i dont have much closet space and it’s a lifesaver!! It is very durable and can fit so much stuff inside, on top and on the bottom of the inside. Keeps things neat, tidy, clean and dust free. Very happy with the purchase! A must have!!
customer_reviews.author: OP

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Easily put together
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together and I did need help putting the cover over it, but it has an entire closets worth of winter coats, hats and boots in it and there is still room for more. I laid a 12" shelf board across the bottom to hold the boots and a basket with hats and gloves......everything fits!!! I would buy this again any day!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Gillogly

customer_reviews.title: “Bend” the perimeter poles that have the sting and then straighten it out again.
customer_reviews.text: It was no easy to figure out the assembly even when trying to follow the steps. Once I figured out how to make it work, and my daughter and I filled it with costumes and dress up clothes, the middle zipper came off. Super frustrating to think I have to take everything out of it and take it apart to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Hard to fix. The plastic covering is way too small for the frame. Mine tore while assembling it. This is the second one i bought and both tore while assembling
customer_reviews.author: candice

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Got the wrong color. Didn’t realize until it was already put together! Way to much of a hassle to exchange. Along with a hole.. Aside from that it was good so far but I’m very disappointed in the color!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT WARDROBE FOR EXTRA CLOTHING!
customer_reviews.text: I PUT IT TOGETHER INCLUDING THE COVER BY MYSELF. EXCELLENT INSTRUCTIONS. BE PATIENT IF YOU ARE ALONE BECAUSE IT TAKES TIME TO ASSEMBLE BUT WORTH THE TROUBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. Houlihan

customer_reviews.title: Solid closet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to store clothes in while we built an addition and it did a great job keeping our clothes covered from dust in the meantime. Decided to keep it as additional storage for our clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Hanging rod bent under the weight of the clothes
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately after 3 days the closet buckled under the weight of the clothes on the bar. definitely not worth the $50. I'll have to go back to shopping around for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: This wardrobe was everything it promised—it was quite easy to put together and seems sturdy. I haven’t had it for very long, but it’s great for what we need, storing coats in the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Jennelle D. Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: This lasted one day. Put shirts and a few sweaters and it cracked in the middle and broke. It was impossible to put together. They absolutely worse item ever purchased. Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Love Earrings

customer_reviews.title: he's very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this for our son for additional clothes storage, he's very happy with it. We were surprised at how sturdy it is. The poles fit tightly together and it does hold a decent amount of clothes. It's my understanding if these units are packed they tend to buckle toward the center. My son does have a lot of clothes in it but hasn't had any issues with it. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up/much larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I did much research before deciding on this purchase and I have to say I'm really satisfied with this product. It was easy to assemble, light weight, much bigger than I expected (in a good way) and seems very durable. I would absolutely purchase this again and recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER CURRAN

customer_reviews.title: More Space
customer_reviews.text: I needed more room for my clothes and this was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tisa A. Gartney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble & sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Instead of building a closet I chose to try this first. It’s sturdy and was easy to assemble by myself. So far so good. Mine is located inside the house.
customer_reviews.author: Wrightway2go

customer_reviews.title: Aweful, do not buy, cheap plastic and metal breaks
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, cheap flimsy plastic broke When putting it together. Plastic just snaps. Metal bends and crumbles. Parts didn't fit together. Didn't even get to put clothes on the rack.
customer_reviews.author: HQ

customer_reviews.title: So difficult to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting how difficult this would be to put together. The cover did not fit at all and we had to cut holes in it to get it to fit around the poles. Truly defeats the purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: This is my 2nd!
customer_reviews.text: Durable, quality fabric, easy to assemble, holding clothes nicely!!!! Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: not worth the $$ pretty flimsy , had some missing parts and seller not helpful
customer_reviews.author: Terry R

product_meta.title: Whitmor Portable Wardrobe Clothes Storage Organizer Closet with Hanging Rack - Extra Wide -Black Color - No-tool Assembly - Extra Strong and Durable - 60"L x 19.5"W x 64"
product_meta.description:
Are you looking for additional closet storage for your home, office, garage, etc. ? Well you’re looking at the right product, Just keep reading.

This new and improved Polypropylene extra-wide stand-alone clothes closet offers you a handy and attractive storage solution that will help you organize your precious garments neatly and efficiently, as opposed to conventional closets and plastic organizers that do not have air flow and wears out your valuable clothing.

This Portable Free Standing Clothes Closet Features:
Breathable fabric cover.
Natural dehumidifier.
Resistance to temperature changes.
Mold Free, Mildew Free, Dust Free, odor and Insects Free. 
Easy do it yourself Assembly & disassembly, no tools needed. 
See-Through Window to identify the contents without having to open the unit. 
Easy access, very reliable zipper that runs and functions smoothly. 
Durable sturdy, long-lasting, heavy-duty steel rod frame.
Supports up to 50 lbs.
Dimensions: 19.5"D x 60"W x 64"H.

PRACTICAL AND FUNCTIONAL:
This Clothes closet is perfect for your everyday storing needs. Its portability is very convenient when you want to move your things around, you don’t need to be equipped with tools as the disassembly and assembly is sooo uncomplicated and simple. 

EASY CLEANING AND MAINTAINING:
You don’t need to frequently polish or paint this Organizer Storage. You can simply remove the fabric from its frame and wash it.

STURDY AND RELIABLE:
The frame is made from high-quality Metal, so its strong enough to handle whatever you throw at it, and a hard-wearing, reliable nylon tooth zipper that runs smoothly and functions well so it can be used for years to come.

So, it is a great choice to get this clothes closet by Whitmor to use in your attic, garage, basement or bedroom, etc. to keep your clothing safe and fresh. 

Click Add to cart ASAP Before it runs out of stock.
feature_bullets: PORTABLE AND MOVEABLE – This storage closet is just right for home use, office use, backstage theater use, dormitory use - You can move it from being a bedroom closet to a garage closet for raincoat, and motorcycle jacket storage, or move it to your attic to keep your classic old worn or seasonal garments organized.

PROTECT YOUR CLOTHS - This Wardrobe Closet Storage is made of breathable fabric cover to keep your most treasured clothes fresh and protects them from mold, dust, bugs, insects, and moisture - Highly suitable in storing all types of clothes, from everyday home and office winter & summer clothing to costumes and special occasion garments and wardrobes.

DURABLE AND STURDY CONSTRUCTION - This PortableStorage Organizer features a - Durable steel frame - A heavy-duty steel rod and a bungee cord system with plastic connectors so it can take on significant weight without bending - Holds 50 pounds of clothes, coats, pants, jackets, suits, blouses, slacks, sweaters, dresses, and shoes.

EASY ASSEMBLING: This closet organizer systems by Whitmor requires no tools to assemble and disassemble so you can do it yourself within minutes by just Following the instructions using a bungee cord system.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - We know you’ll love this portable wardrobe closet as much as we do. In fact, if for any reason, you’re not completely satisfied, just feel free to return your order within 30 days and we’ll issue a full refund.
